hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that the daughter of Hamzah was suggested to Messenger of Allah (as a potential wife). He said:"She is the daughter of my brother through breast-feeding, and what becomes unlawful (for marriage) through breast-feeding is the same as that which becomes unlawful through lineage

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ بِنْتِ الأَخِ مِنَ الرَّضَاعَةِ .
chapter.eng-name: The Daughter Of One's Brother Through Breast-feeding Is Forbidden For Marriage
